mapper.sql: brand_no, brand_banner_seq, title_text, image_name, image_path_text, image_url, altrn_text, disp_yn, rgster_no, rgst_dtm, moder_no, mod_dtm
mapper.update:
/*+ kr.co.abcmart.bo.product.repository.master.DpBrandProductDetailDao.update [기본 update 쿼리] [Generator] */
UPDATE dp_brand_product_detail
brand_no = #{brandNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brand_banner_seq = #{brandBannerSeq, jdbcType=INTEGER},
title_text = #{titleText, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
image_name = #{imageName, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
image_path_text = #{imagePathText, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
image_url = #{imageUrl, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
altrn_text = #{altrnText, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
disp_yn = #{dispYn, jdbcType=CHAR},
rgster_no = #{rgsterNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rgst_dtm = #{rgstDtm, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
moder_no = #{moderNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mod_dtm = #{modDtm, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WHERE brand_banner_seq = #{brandBannerSeq, jdbcType=INTEGER} AND brand_no = #{brandNo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
